titles.title: While Toil And Warfare Urge Us On (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}While toil and warfare Urge us on our way And heart is answering Heart in signs of pain Have we no words of Strengthening joy to say No songs for those Who suffer but to reign{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O for the faithful mind The steadfast eye To keep our leader's Glory full in sight And make our converse Even while we die An interchange Of triumph and delight{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold the paths Of life are ours - we see Our blest inheritance Where'er we tread Sorrow and danger our security And disappointment Lifting up our head{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kings unto God We may not doubt our power We may not languish When He says "Be strong" We must move on Through every adverse hour And take possession As we pass along{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes all is for us Nothing shall withstand Our faithful valiant Persevering claim The rod of God's Anointed in our hand And our assurance His unchanging name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We need no haste Where He has said "Be still" No peace Where He has charged us To contend Only the fearless Love to do His will And to show forth His honor to the end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O ye that faint and die Arise and live Sing ye that all things Have a charge to bless If He is faithful Who hath sworn to give Then be ye also faithful And possess{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take thy whole portion With thy Master's mind Toil hinderance hardness With His virtue take And think how short A time thy heart may find To labor or to suffer For His sake{/lang-eng}
